title: Calculate Factorial
description:
Calculate the factorial of a number.

Implement an efficient solution.
hints: Use iteration instead of recursion to avoid stack overflow.
Use long type to avoid integer overflow.

title: Fibonacci Sequence
description:
Generate the nth Fibonacci number.

Implement an efficient solution.
hints: Use iteration to avoid exponential time complexity of recursion.
Only keep track of the last two Fibonacci numbers.
For large n, use dynamic programming or matrix exponentiation.

title: GCD of Two Numbers
description:
Find the Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of two numbers.

Implement an efficient solution using the Euclidean algorithm.
hints: Use the Euclidean algorithm: GCD(a,b) = GCD(b, a%b).
The GCD is the last non-zero remainder.
